content: a warm wool hat with a pickleball motif a bright ball is a must for pickleball but other than that you could choose any other colors to make this charted pattern i used knit picks palette fingering weight yarns in these colors mc1 - asphalt heather 80 yds mc2 - larch heather 25 yds mc3 - abyss heather 11 yds cc1 - canary 20 yds cc2 - lichen 20 yds cc3 - tarragon 15yds the hat is made with a 2x2 ribbing to start then you go into the colorwork reading from the chart
